channel.title: Gun Duels in DCS World on
channel.description: Recent content in Gun Duels in DCS World on

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introducing the ELO Dogfight Challenge, by Coubystark. In short # The ELO Dogfight server offers you to carry out 1 against 1 gun fights, with the plane of your choice, H24, 7/7. The matches are played in 3 points (possible results: 3-0 or 2-1). All match results are saved on the server, and an “ELO” is calculated for each pilot, per aircraft used, based on the result of each match.

item.title: Rules
item.description: Some rules to be respected by any participant in ELO Dogfight. Fighter Spirit Whatever the circumstances, we stay cool and we have fun! The throwing of the glove is allowed, but must remain in a chivalrous and good-natured spirit. Exchanges on this server must remain limited to gun fights. For any philosophical, political, ethical debate, please find yourself on another media. Comments on the chat, in voice, and player name, racist, insulting, harassing, or having any background reprehensible by French law, are strictly prohibited.

item.title: Questions - Answers
item.description: ðŸ’¡ Can't find your question? Come ask us on Discord. Once in game # How do I know if the first merge happened? # This point can be tricky, especially for newcomers. We recommend ensuring a crossing as close as possible. Failing that, when you see that the two planes have started to turn around having made more than 90Â° of course change… it means that the merge has passed!
